00051 namespace TREX {
00052   namespace transaction {
00053     namespace details {
00054       
00064       typedef std::list<goal_id>                           goal_queue;
00073       typedef utils::map_id_traits< Relation, goal_queue > pending_traits;
00086       typedef utils::list_set<pending_traits>              external_set;
00087       
00101       class external 
00102       :public boost::iterator_adaptor<external, external_set::iterator>{
00103       public:
00109         typedef Relation::value_type   value_type;
00114         typedef Relation::reference    reference;
00119         typedef Relation::pointer      pointer;
00120         
00129         external();
00136         external(external const &other);
00138         ~external() {}
00139         
00152         bool operator==(external const &other) const;
00165         bool operator!=(external const &other) const {
00166           return !operator==(other);
00167         }
00175         bool valid() const {
00176           return m_last!=m_pos;
00177         }
00178         
00205         bool post_goal(goal_id const &g);
00225         void dispatch(TICK current, goal_queue &sent);
00238         void recall(goal_id const &g);
00239         
00250         pointer operator->() const {
00251           return &operator* ();
00252         }
00265         reference operator* () const {
00266           return m_pos->first;
00267         }
00268         
00275         external &operator++();
00276         
00277       private:
00278         TREX::utils::internals::LogEntry syslog();
00279         
00280         external_set::iterator m_pos, m_last;
00281         
00282         external(external_set::iterator const &pos,
00283                  external_set::iterator const &last, 
00284                  bool only_active=true);
00285         
00286         
00287         static bool cmp_goals(IntegerDomain const &a, IntegerDomain const &b);
00288         
00289         void next_active();
00290         
00291         goal_queue::iterator lower_bound(IntegerDomain const &dom);
00292         
00293         friend class TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor;
00294       }; // TREX::transaction::details::external
